channel.title: Pi commands help
channel.description: ok i have ::giveitem ::checkbank ::takeitem and ::clearinv when the player has spaces it doesn't work is there a way to fix this?

item.title: Pi commands help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“teh one, post:3, topic:405804”]Yeah, will you please post your commands.java please.

It sounds like you haven’t added the methods for the commands right. Like ::clearinvi (empty).

For example:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("clearinvi")) { c.getPA().removeAllItems(); }

Your going to need a method in PlayerAssistant.

public void removeAllItems() { for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.playerItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItemsN.length; i++) { c.playerItemsN[i] = 0; } c.getItems().resetItems(3214); }

You can work the other ones out yourself :)[/quote]
No, he’s saying the commands work but not on usernames with spaces… I already fixed this for him on rune - server

Read full topic

item.title: Pi commands help
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Yeah, will you please post your commands.java please.

It sounds like you haven’t added the methods for the commands right. Like ::clearinvi (empty).

For example:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("clearinvi")) { c.getPA().removeAllItems(); }

Your going to need a method in PlayerAssistant.

public void removeAllItems() { for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.playerItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItemsN.length; i++) { c.playerItemsN[i] = 0; } c.getItems().resetItems(3214); }

You can work the other ones out yourself
